UI/UX Designer

• Responsive Design
• Team Leadership
• Project Management
• Competitor Analysis
• Mobile and Web Design

CAREER OBJECTIVES
• Seeking remote opportunities in UI/UX design
• Interest in mentorship-driven environments
• Committed to continuous professional development
